akn:section.akn:heading: Articles and services of industrial facilities: sale to persons outside the Department of Defense

akn:content.akn:p: (b) The Secretary may designate facilities referred to in subsection (a) as the facilities from which articles and services manufactured or performed by such facilities may be sold under this section.

(e) Proceeds from sales of articles and services under this section shall be credited to the funds, including working capital funds and operation and maintenance funds, incurring the costs of manufacture or performance.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Relationship to Arms Export Control Act.—

akn:content.akn:p: (f) Nothing in this section shall be construed to affect the application of the export controls provided for in section 38 of the Arms Export Control Act (22 U.S.C. 2778) to items which incorporate or are produced through the use of an article sold under this section.
